messages.content: Dear Resident, As I come back in after another evening out speaking to local residents, I wanted to say thank you for the warm reception Councillor Clive Campbell and I have received. As I reflect on the ten years since I was elected to represent you in Parliament - it's been an honour to work for you and fight for our area...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need an integrated transport system.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Justice for Victims of Criminal Driving
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need a change in the law to get justice for victims of criminal driving and their families.

issues.environment: Their fight to protect green fields

leaflet.personalStatement: I know there is so much more to do here.

politicalExperience.achievements: Protecting green fields, campaigning to make roads safer with 20 mph speed limits and pedestrian crossings - working together we have had real successes.
